name: Condense Postbodies
description: This condenses posts in order to fit more posts on the screen.

user.name: tn5421
user.about: I'm just someone that writes css to fix things that inconvenience me

additional_info:
v1.2.1 - Table of Contents edition
The site supports a Table of Contents for larger posts.  Functionality was added to make these posts stand out and keep the Table of Contents human-readable.

v1.2.0 - The Widening
Made the site use most of the width available to it.  Doesn't look right unless used at 120% zoom, guesstimate values for regular zoom included in comments.

v1.1.1 - Unquotening The Quotening
Fixed my screwup; can't mess with the top border of the quotes for some reason, so shrunk the bottom border.

v1.1.0 - The Quotening
I'm not really all that happy with this, but better a slightly broken looking quote than all that wasted space.

v1.0.0 - Initial Commit
The initial version of the style.
